name: Black male body in motion
description: The ‚ÄúBody‚Äù series brings a contradiction to the association of black bodies to dead people. The series brings these bodies in motion, vibrating life, power, beauty, resistance among other inspiring feelings. The dancer portrayed is Guilherme Holanda, who mixes street, contemporary, capoeira and martial arts in his work / The video was exhibited at Museum of Modern Art (MAM/RJ) https://www.favelagrafia.com.br/2019/  Direction and photography: Saulo Nicolai / Edition and sound: Tundra_studies
